A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Terrible. Worse than the prequels.
Cringey one liners\, corny jokes\, Leia flying through space\, Snoke being some "Ultimate Evil" but then being defeated in a matter of seconds\, no explanation for who Snoke is or how he gained power\, tons of plot holes\, no cohesive story. Did not fit into the Star Wars Universe.

I am appalled how this got so many raving critic reviews.
